title: Albanese travelled across the world for a date with Trump, only to be stood up

content.author: Jane Norman and Jane Norman
content.description: Seven months in the making, Anthony Albanese told reporters that he had prepared extensively to finally meet with US President Donald Trump. Then a social media post landed with a thud.
